tool_description: Filters suppliers based on geographic location criteria including countries, regions, proximity to facilities, and logistics preferences.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to filter

preferred_countries.description: ISO country codes for preferred locations

excluded_countries.description: ISO country codes for excluded locations

max_distance_km.description: Maximum distance in kilometers from reference location

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required.
Invalid country codes: Use ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes (e.g., US, GB, DE).
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180.
Invalid max_distance_km: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 50000.
Missing coordinate pair: Both reference_latitude and reference_longitude required for distance filtering.
Geographic data unavailable: Location data not available for some suppliers.
usage: Provide supplier_ids array to filter. Use preferred_countries/excluded_countries for country-based filtering, or reference coordinates with max_distance_km for proximity filtering. Returns filtered supplier list with location details.

filtered_supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs that meet geographic criteria

distances_km.description: Array of distances in km from reference point (if applicable)
